name: VR Markers
description:
This experiment was testing out whiteboard and chalk board interactions with markers, eraser etc. There are several different input methods in this experience for you.

Press the thumb stick in to see different hand and arm variants, use your left hand to teleport around the scene and select a board to draw on. 

Supported Hardware:

  • HTC Vive
  • Oculus Rift S

Unknown support:

  • Windows mixed reality
  • Older Oculus hardware

Note: There may be bugs

Note: Valve Index Controllers are not currently supported
